original_solution_mapping.L1: Out of the 20 students, 20 x 1/4 = <<20*1/4=5>>5 students stayed in the classroom.
original_solution_mapping.L2: While 20 - 5 = <<20-5=15>>15 students went to the playground.
original_solution_mapping.L3: Out of these 15 students, 15 x 1/3 = <<15*1/3=5>>5 are boys.
original_solution_mapping.L4: Therefore, 15 - 5 = <<15-5=10>>10 girl students from this class are in the playground.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 1867.
    Returns: the number of girls on the playground from this class.
    """
    # L1
    total_students = 20 # 20 students in a class
    classroom_fraction = Fraction(1, 4) # one-fourth of the students
    students_in_classroom = total_students * classroom_fraction

    # L2
    students_in_playground = total_students - students_in_classroom

    # L3
    boys_fraction = Fraction(1, 3) # one-third are boys
    boys_in_playground = students_in_playground * boys_fraction

    # L4
    girls_in_playground = students_in_playground - boys_in_playground

    # FA
    answer = girls_in_playground
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: Out of the {total_students} students, {total_students} x {classroom_fraction} = <<{total_students}*{classroom_fraction}={students_in_classroom}>>{students_in_classroom} students stayed in the classroom.
While {total_students} - {students_in_classroom} = <<{total_students}-{students_in_classroom}={students_in_playground}>>{students_in_playground} students went to the playground.
Out of these {students_in_playground} students, {students_in_playground} x {boys_fraction} = <<{students_in_playground}*{boys_fraction}={boys_in_playground}>>{boys_in_playground} are boys.

Therefore, {students_in_playground} - {boys_in_playground} = <<{students_in_playground}-{boys_in_playground}={girls_in_playground}>>{girls_in_playground} girl students from this class are in the playground.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: Out of the 1/4 students, 1/4 x 1/4 = <<1/4*1/4=1/16>>1/16 students stayed in the classroom.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: While 20 - 1/16 = <<20-1/16=319/16>>319/16 students went to the playground.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L4: Therefore, 319/16 - 319/48 = <<319/16-319/48=319/24>>319/24 girl students from this class are in the playground.

explanation: Input misrepresentation. The value for 'classroom_fraction' (1/4) was used instead of 'total_students' (20).
